key_risk_themes: ["High Technical Complexity in Core Features (GPU Rendering, DICOM)","Stringent HIPAA Compliance & Security Requirements","Dependencies on External Systems and Customer Environments"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Initiate a time-boxed technical spike for the GPU rendering engine to validate feasibility and performance.","Develop a HIPAA Compliance Traceability Matrix and schedule a third-party security audit.","Create a detailed plan for robust prerequisite checking in the installer and customer-facing documentation."]
